overview: Beginning in the early 1990s, trailblazing designers and daring industry titans usher in a three-decade golden era of fashion transcendence. While designers John Galliano, Marc Jacobs, Alexander McQueen and Tom Ford elevate the craft to new heights, stalwarts Bernard Arnault, Françios Pianult and Anna Wintour bring the world of couture to the masses. With never-before-seen archival material, this intriguing jaunt through international fashion capitals details how the industry’s powerbrokers molded the landscape of modern style. DOC NYC presents the first two episodes of this upcoming four-part limited series.
title: Kingom of Dreams
